dmca.title: Poet complains of copied greeting card poem
dmca.body:
Notice of Copyright reference http://beginning123.blogspotcom/ 

Mr. CR Slater 
[private]
Newcastle upon Tyne 
[private]England 
[private]

Sir Madam, 
I am the genuine true author/owner and copyright holder of the below verse/poem taken from my Greeting Card web site (a copyright warning was downloaded with this material and knowingly removed by the offender) 

This is now currently illegally displayed on your server without any given author/owner consent 

My Greeting Cards have been online since 1986. I write material to raise income for three registered UK charities these provide me with copyright on all my verses/poems works. 

I swear on oath (also as a committed Christian) under penalty of Federal and European prosecution for perjury that I am author and copyright holder of the said material (displayed as below). 

If a signed copy of this notice is required by your company, I will post one today as an image attachment for you to view and print.
 
/[private]/ 
[private]

Poem displayed on your site clearly marked as on my own web site at location(s) given below. 
http://www.quickegreets.com/family/mfsister.htm 
http:/www.quickegreets.com/javafree/family/mfsister.htm 
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/family/mfsister.htm 
http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/family/mfsister.htm 

ChrisRS
